cause.description:
Tusubira means “we have hope” in Lusoga, a language commonly spoken in Southeastern Uganda. The effects of the HIV/AIDS pandemic causes many challenges there, yet hope remains through the increasing development of communities and their people.
http://www.wehavehope.org
**to DONATE, please go to www.wehavehope.org and use our paypal system---the funds will get to us much faster than the through the facebook donation system. THANK YOU!!**
1. Worldwide collaboration is needed to fight the devastating effects of HIV/AIDS.
2. Communities in Uganda are capable of determining their own solutions to challenges of poverty.
3. Education is a vital tool in fighting poverty, disease, and HIV/AIDS.
cause.mission: Tusubira - We have hope is a 501c3 non-profit org that works to build relationships, remove barriers caused by poverty and injustice, and create opportunities for vulnerable communities in Uganda.
